content: @Eric Haas noticed that you are working on Device UDI - would you be able to share some light on the status of this topic?

addressing all the trackers for Device 99% of whicH concern UDI. Creating more examples , rewriting all the text and adding mappings to UDI components I am about 50% complete. HL7 OO need to vote on a couple of things on which we have had no consensus to date. I cannot say when this will all be resolved. hopeful in a couple of week.
we're preparing to start some work on the device comm side of things and wanted to align with efforts "downstream" would be great to keep up to date on the resolutions for those other open items
latest will be on the Current build still a WIP.
